title: The Familiar Stranger
description:
Description :
        [Translated by Mosh Scans]Choi Hyun, an unemployed man living without dreams or motivation, goes for an interview with the rising fashion bran "Larguir." Facing Ian, the handsome and sharp-tongued CEO, Hyun answers without much care, figuring he has nothing to lose, and, to his surprise, gets hired. On his first day of work, Hyun gets heavily drunk at the company dinner and wakes up the next morning to find Ian lying next to him half-naked. As Hyun despairs over the memories of the previous night, Ian kindly offers to teach him about design... and more."By any chance, do you know who I am?"
